background.$description: The default background color for the application.

foreground.$description: The default color for elements or text that appears on top of the background.

DEFAULT.$description: The background color for cards, modals, and other containers.

foreground.$description: The default color for text or elements that appear on top of cards.

DEFAULT.$description: The background color for dropdowns and tooltips.

foreground.$description: The default color for text or elements that appear on top of dropdowns.

DEFAULT.$description: The primary color used for buttons, links, and other interactive elements.

foreground.$description: The default color for text or elements that appear on top of primary colored elements.

DEFAULT.$description: The secondary color used for secondary buttons and interactive elements.

foreground.$description: The default color for text or elements that appear on top of secondary colored elements.

DEFAULT.$description: The muted color used for less prominent elements.

foreground.$description: The default color for text or elements that appear on top of muted colored elements.

DEFAULT.$description: The accent color used for highlights and interactive elements.

foreground.$description: The default color for text or elements that appear on top of accent colored elements.

DEFAULT.$description: The color used for destructive actions like delete buttons.

foreground.$description: The default color for text on destructive colored elements.

DEFAULT.$description: The color used for success states and messages.

foreground.$description: The default color for text on success colored elements.

border.$description: The default border color for elements.

DEFAULT.$description: The background color for input fields once text has been filled.

background.$description: The default background color for input fields.

ring.$description: The color for focus rings and focus indicators.
